name: History
descriptions: Most of our History majors pursue careers outside of History. Our courses will prepare you for a variety of career paths by developing your skills in research, synthesizing large amounts of information, constructing arguments, and communicating your ideas effectively.
Check out the different Minors available to see how History courses will prepare you for jobs in those areas:

internship.description: The history department's internship program helps students gain practical experience working in museums and archives or on history-related projects for local organizations. Internship Options Include: The National Archives at Fort Worth, The Fort Worth Museum of Science and History, and The Tarrant County Archives You can also explore other local institutions, and access volunteer opportunities
